content.value: I want to have an AWS region where everything breaks with high frequency.  EC2 networks dropping packets, EBS volumes hanging and failing, entire AZs dropping offline, etc.  If it breaks 0.001% of the time in us-east-1, I want it to break 1% of the time in us-fail-1. #awswishlist
